name: Won Empowered
description:
When her son was born, Won Park went through a career interruption to devote herself to her child's needs. She was a reputable Marketing Director when she put her career on hold. Just like her mother and grandmother had done before her.

Ten years later, after going through a divorce, she finds herself facing the reality of the employment market in her new assistant position. As an immigrant divorced mother, she has to face a series of events both in the personal and work environment as she navigates this new adventure. Will she be able to become the shero of her own path?

Won Empowered is a decision-making and resource management game that invites players to put themselves in women's shoes in their constant battle with gender microaggressions. 

  

Credits Art

Anastasia Genero

Lucia Seggiaro

Narrative Design
